text: @realDonaldTrump @RWSalt Just how stupid are you?!? There is no state that will avoid being hard hit by #COVID19. You need to fucking go away for a while. You have continually made this worse.  Just step away and let the grown-ups take care of this. Maybe have an Obama team come in & fix everything.
